entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wabush Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:53 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -23.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wabush Airport 3:00 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -23.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -33
Dewpoint: -29.8°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 27 with temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 February 2023
